channel.title: Disable Allow HTML content
channel.description: Hi. Is it possible to disable Allow HTML content parameter by default on queries results? I am using Redash with Clickhouse. In one of my columns I have html text. And when I was executing select query from such column the html text was breaking the redash UI. If I save the query, disable manually Allow HTML content checkbox on that column, it works normally. But this is inconvenient a lot. Is there any way to disable this setting by default? Perhaps with the help of the base, or in the source code ? Thanks. PS. I am using self-hosted docker Redash instance, the last version.

item.title: Disable Allow HTML content
item.dc:creator: igor-sh8
item.description:
Hi.
Is it possible to disable Allow HTML content parameter by default on queries results?
I am using Redash with Clickhouse. In one of my columns I have html text. And when I was executing select query from such column the html text was breaking the redash UI. If I save the query, disable manually Allow HTML content checkbox on that column, it works normally. But this is inconvenient a lot.
Is there any way to disable this setting by default? Perhaps with the help of the base, or in the source code ?
Thanks.
PS. I am using self-hosted docker Redash instance, the last version.

Read full topic
